import React from 'react' import './ProfileCard.css'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const ProfileCard = () => { const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.authReducer.authData) const serverPublic = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER const ProfilePage = false; return (
{user.firstname} {user.lastname} {user.worksAt}
9999 Following
1 Followers
{ProfilePage && ( <>
3 Posts
)}
{ProfilePage ? '' : My profile }
) } export default ProfileCard
